2. ENROLLMENT DATA ANALYSIS
----------------------------------------
Total Enrollment Records: 2,622,225
Date Range: 2025-01-04 to 2025-12-11
Geographic Coverage:
  • Number of States: 54
  • Number of Districts: 954
  • Number of Pincodes: 19179

Age Group Distribution:
  • age_0_5: 1,572,332 (60.0%)
  • age_5_17: 935,217 (35.7%)
  • age_18_greater: 114,676 (4.4%)

Top 5 States by Enrollment:
  1. Uttar Pradesh: 554,062 (21.1%)
  2. Bihar: 299,950 (11.4%)
  3. Madhya Pradesh: 232,136 (8.9%)
  4. Maharashtra: 171,931 (6.6%)
  5. Gujarat: 166,816 (6.4%)

  • Peak Enrollment Month: 2025-01
  • Average Daily Enrollment: 87,408
  • Total Days of Data: 30

5. COMPARATIVE ANALYSIS
----------------------------------------
Enrollment vs Demographic Updates:
  • Demographic updates are 902.4% of total enrollments
  • Ratio: 1 enrollment : 9.02 demographic updates

Enrollment vs Biometric Updates:
  • Biometric updates are 1083.0% of total enrollments
  • Ratio: 1 enrollment : 10.83 biometric updates

Demographic vs Biometric Updates:
  • Demographic updates are 83.3% of biometric updates

6. KEY INSIGHTS AND FINDINGS
----------------------------------------
Geographic Concentration:
  • Top 3 states account for 41.4% of all enrollments
  • States: Uttar Pradesh, Bihar, Madhya Pradesh

Growth Analysis:
  • Overall growth rate: -91.4%
  • From 2025-01 to 2025-12
